item.title: Writing Spark Native Functions (Catalyst Expressions)
item.description: Writing Spark Native Functions (Catalyst Expressions) This post explains how Spark’s public interface is exposed via catalyst expressions and how you can write your own functions in this manner. Catalyst expressions are a great way to write performant code and learn about how Spark works under the hood.
